steps.summary: Trend endpoint GET /api/insights/ai_sector_risk/trend returns HTTP 200. Default days=30, returns 1 datapoint with composite trend and 6 metric trends.
Custom days=7 parameter accepted. Response shows days: 7 confirming parameter handling works correctly.
Parameter validation working: Invalid category returns 404. Invalid days (-1) returns 422 with message "days >= 7".
Trend datapoint structure verified: category_id, days, trend (date/score/status), metrics (6 keys: ai_price_anomaly, fed_expectations, ipo_heat, news_sentiment, smart_money_flow, yield_curve)
